title: Proper Makeup Removal
directions: Using a makeup removal toilette or oil free micellar water, begin completely removing makeup including mascara

title: Cleansing
directions: using sulfate free cleanser along with  a washcloth or Clarisonic, begin cleansing to remove build-up and leftover makeup

title: After Cleanse Treatment
directions: saturate cotton pads with mild toner and begin toning skin in circular motions to additionally remove what the cleansing process might have left behind. Follow that step by using your acne treatment of choice if needed, then follow up with a light moisturizer of choice

title: DIY Detox Facial Mask
directions: In a non metal bowl with a non metal spoon, mix 2 tsp of Aztec secret indian healing clay, 3 capsules activated charcoal, 1/2 tsp of raw honey and 1 1/2 tsp water into a paste consistency and apply to skin avoiding eyes and nostrils. Rinse thoroughly with warm water after 15 minutes
